title: docqa-engine: chunking, citation_scorer, evaluator enhancement (+36 tests)
description:
Enhance docqa-engine: chunking.py, citation_scorer.py, evaluator.py (+36 tests). Path: /Users/cave/Documents/GitHub/docqa-engine. Current: 148 tests, target: 184.

CITATION_SCORER (+12 tests): Add source_quality, verify_claim, verify_all_claims, cross_reference. New dataclasses: SourceQuality, VerificationResult. ~100 LOC.

EVALUATOR (+12 tests): Add context_precision, context_recall, answer_correctness, noise_robustness, evaluate_rag_extended. ~130 LOC.

Also update __init__.py exports.
